Scripting

Drafts actions may contain Script steps which execute Javascript. The Javascript engine is implemented using the JavaScriptCore implementation Apple ships with the host platform, and all standard libraries are available to work with native Javascript data types. Note that this is not a browser hosted Javascript environment and will not have access to the same extensions to the language provided by browsers, like the Document Object Model and XHTTP objects.

w3schools.com Javascript reference is an excellent resource on basic language objects and functions.

Drafts extends the Javascript environment with many objects to allow manipulation of drafts, the editor - and to interact with system and online services.

Details on the objects currently available in Drafts scripting environment is maintained at the project Wiki at this time.

Also note that the Drafts scripting environment includes Date.js, a great library which extends Javascript Date and Number objects for easier date manipulation and basic natural language date parsing. All examples and detailed documentation are available on the Date.js site

This project is maintained by agiletortoise
